title: SyntaxError when I trying to compile main.js as described in tutorial
body:
I read http://facebook.github.io/react/docs/getting-started.html What i did: sudo npm install -g browserify npm install --save react react-dom npm install --save babelify touch main.js ``` // main.js var React = require('react'); var ReactDOM = require('react-dom'); ReactDOM.render(

Hello, world!

, document.getElementById('example') ); ``` Next, I call browserify -t babelify main.js -o bundle.js And I got SyntaxError ``` [nik@fedora tut]$ browserify -t babelify main.js -o bundle.js SyntaxError: /media/files596/Programming/Examples-Web/React/tut/main.js: Unexpected token (6:2) 4 | 5 | ReactDOM.render( > 6 |

Hello, world!

, | ^ 7 | document.getElementById('example') 8 | ); at Parser.pp.raise (/media/files596/Programming/Examples-Web/React/tut/node_modules/babelify/node_modules/babel-core/node_modules/babylon/lib/parser/location.js:24:13) at Parser.pp.unexpected (/media/files596/Programming/Examples-Web/React/tut/node_modules/babelify/node_modules/babel-core/node_modules/babylon/lib/parser/util.js:91:8) at Parser.pp.parseExprAtom (/media/files596/Programming/Examples-Web/React/tut/node_modules/babelify/node_modules/babel-core/node_modules/babylon/lib/parser/expression.js:507:12) at Parser.pp.parseExprSubscripts (/media/files596/Programming/Examples-Web/React/tut/node_modules/babelify/node_modules/babel-core/node_modules/babylon/lib/parser/expression.js:260:19) at Parser.pp.parseMaybeUnary (/media/files596/Programming/Examples-Web/React/tut/node_modules/babelify/node_modules/babel-core/node_modules/babylon/lib/parser/expression.js:240:19) at Parser.pp.parseExprOps (/media/files596/Programming/Examples-Web/React/tut/node_modules/babelify/node_modules/babel-core/node_modules/babylon/lib/parser/expression.js:171:19) at Parser.pp.parseMaybeConditional (/media/files596/Programming/Examples-Web/React/tut/node_modules/babelify/node_modules/babel-core/node_modules/babylon/lib/parser/expression.js:153:19) at Parser.pp.parseMaybeAssign (/media/files596/Programming/Examples-Web/React/tut/node_modules/babelify/node_modules/babel-core/node_modules/babylon/lib/parser/expression.js:120:19) at Parser.pp.parseExprListItem (/media/files596/Programming/Examples-Web/React/tut/node_modules/babelify/node_modules/babel-core/node_modules/babylon/lib/parser/expression.js:966:16) at Parser.pp.parseCallExpressionArguments (/media/files596/Programming/Examples-Web/React/tut/node_modules/babelify/node_modules/babel-core/node_modules/babylon/lib/parser/expression.js:336:20) ```
